concept.title: Remote Lighting Overview
concept.shortdesc: Remote lighting allows you to operate network-based home lighting through a remote control.

conbody.p: The kit includes a wireless smart lighting system that helps make the lighting in your home more energy efficient and easier to manage. The kit includes the following components:

dlentry.dd: Allows you to power on, power off, and dim groups of lights on your network.
Energy-efficient network light bulbs you can install into standard light fixtures.
